title: Finally Finally
body: After getting ban 3 times in LOL, almost got ban 4th time although still on the edge right not, I know you guys must be thinking what is going on, but finally i am GOLD {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}} F U C K  SO HAPPY RIGHT NOW :D

replies.body:
Congrats man! Hopefully I'll be up there with you once I get some free time again :D

Also, a quick word of caution. I'm not quite sure what you meant by _"getting ban 3 times in LOL"_, but if by that you mean that you've been punished 3 times by the instant feedback system, then be careful! Next time you break the rules it could result in your account being permanently banned :(

> [{quoted}](name=Tele,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=X7PVtE7O,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-03-20T06:58:42.981+0000)
>
> Congrats man! Hopefully I'll be up there with you once I get some free time again :D
> 
> Also, a quick word of caution. I'm not quite sure what you meant by _"getting ban 3 times in LOL"_, but if by that you mean that you've been punished 3 times by the instant feedback system, then be careful! Next time you break the rules it could result in your account being permanently banned :(

i mean i have been Permanently  Ban 3 times in past xD this is my 4th account xD idm i am down for a game ^^
